metadata.title: Physical and Chemical Investigations: Bering Sea, Bering Strait, Chukchi Sea during the Summer of 1937 and 1938

creators.name: Joe R. Goodman, John H. Lincoln, Thomas G. Thompson,
Frederick A. Zeusler of the University of Washington, Seattle, Washington, USA.

metadata.description: To report findings of the physical and chemical investigations in the Bering Sea, Bering Strait, and Chukchi Sea during the summer of 1937 and 1938.
metadata.notes:
